Son épouse Pam, qui tient un institut de beauté, ne supporte plus de le voir traîner avec son meilleur ami Lenny Bar. Gus décide alors d'entamer une thérapie de groupe. Son psy Samuel Pupkin découvre alors que Gus fait des rêves incroyables où il devient un superhéros invincible et vengeur.

programme.title: Alexandre
programme.desc: Au IVe siècle av. J.-C., Ptolémée raconte la vie d'Alexandre le Grand, qui fut un conquérant sans équivalant dans l'Antiquité. A 20 ans, après l'assassinat de son père, le roi Philippe II de Macédoine, Alexandre en devient le souverain. Porté par l'amour de sa mère, Olympie, l'enseignement d'Aristote et sa soif de conquêtes, Alexandre, à la tête d'une impressionnante armée, soumet la Grèce, fonde Alexandrie, défie les Perses, s'empare de Babylone et bâtit, à 32 ans, l'un des plus grands empires ayant jamais existé. Le grand conquérant règne désormais sur une importante partie du globe.

programme.title: Mais vous êtes fous
programme.desc: Roman Clementi, dentiste, est marié à Camille et tous deux sont parents de deux petites filles, Lucie et Bianca. Mais Roman cache un lourd secret à sa famille et à ses proches : cet hyperactif est en fait dépendant à la cocaïne. Tout bascule quand Bianca est transportée d'urgence à l'hôpital et que des traces de cocaïne sont retrouvées dans son organisme. Roman est alors obligé d'avouer son addiction à tout son entourage.

programme.title: Voir le jour
programme.desc: Jeanne travaille comme auxiliaire dans une maternité de Marseille. Le quotidien du service est marqué par des restrictions de budget, mais aussi des manifestations contre l’avortement et l’arrivée de Jennifer, une jeune stagiaire que Jeanne doit encadrer. Un jour, elle apprend qu’un jumeau est mort à la naissance. La mère est tombée en catatonie. Jeanne est très marquée par la nouvelle. Le père des enfants porte plainte. Et Sylvie, la supérieure de Jeanne, est attaquée pour négligence. Dans le même temps, Jeanne reçoit une visite d’un passé qu’elle pensait révolu.

programme.title: Fini de jouer
programme.desc: A 32 ans, Abe Applebaum n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il a été. Détective prodige dès l'âge de 13 ans, le jeune homme a connu une certaine notoriété avant de déchoir sévèrement. Désormais légèrement alcoolique, Abe, 32 ans, vit toujours dans la ville pavillonnaire de Willowbrook, sous le regard navré de ses parents et en est réduit à traiter des affaires mineures, souvent très mal rémunérées. Tout change quand Caroline, une de ses anciennes clientes, vient le voir pour l'aider à résoudre le meurtre de son petit ami, tué de 17 coups de couteaux.

programme.title: Alex Rider
programme.sub-title: S2 E5 Seul contre tous

programme.title: Braquo
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 Max

programme.title: Braquo
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 La ligne jaune

programme.title: Braquo
programme.sub-title: S1 E3 La tête dans le sac

programme.title: Braquo
programme.sub-title: S1 E4 L'autre rive

programme.title: Maigret
programme.sub-title: Maigret et les plaisirs de la nuit

programme.title: Interruption des programmes
programme.desc: Ernest, un gros ours solitaire, bohème et bougon, a accueilli dans sa petite maison Célestine, une souricette orpheline, rebelle et intrépide. Ces deux personnages hors du commun, qui ont des caractères aussi différents que leur gabarit, apprennent à se connaître et à vivre ensemble. Ils côtoient Margotine, Mandarine et Mélusine, trois souris voisines, élèvent des abeilles et fabriquent leur propre confiture. Le plantigrade au grand cœur et le rongeur malicieux affrontent les problèmes de la vie quotidienne, comme la honte, la maladie ou les poux, partagent leurs joies et leurs peines, et s'interrogent sur leurs origines.

programme.title: Maigret
programme.sub-title: Maigret chez les Flamands

programme.title: Maigret
programme.sub-title: Maigret et la maison du juge

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S9 E1 De paille et de sang

programme.title: Inspecteur Lewis
programme.sub-title: S9 E2 Magnum Opus

programme.title: La nuit du réveillon
programme.desc: Le 24 décembre, un homme grimé en père Noël fait irruption au domicile de Pierre Boutonnier, directeur d'une agence bancaire, et de sa femme Patricia et de leurs trois jeunes enfants. Sous la menace d'un pistolet, Patricia est contrainte de porter une ceinture d'explosifs. Puis, l'individu masqué ordonne à Pierre de l'accompagner le lendemain à l'aube à la banque pour lui ouvrir la salle des coffres. L'homme, qui prétend s'appeler Gérard Soulier, est le patron d'une société de surveillance qui a fait faillite..

programme.title: Mystère place vendôme
programme.desc: En 1898, Jeanne, saucière de renom dans un palace parisien, apprend que son fils de 10 ans, Paul, a été kidnappé. Si elle veut le revoir, la jeune femme doit obéir aux mystérieux ravisseurs qui lui demandent d'empoisonner un émissaire austro-hongrois lors d'un dîner diplomatique dans l'un des salons de l'hôtel. Mais folle d'inquiétude, Jeanne décide de partir seule à la recherche de son enfant. Elle fait alors une rencontre étrange, qui ne tarde pas à la confronter à un passé qu'elle pensait révolu.

programme.title: Mystère à la Tour Eiffel
programme.desc: A Paris, en 1889, en marge de l'ouverture de la tour Eiffel, un collaborateur de l'ingénieur Gustave Eiffel est retrouvé mort dans l'ascenseur du monument métallique, une paire de ciseaux plantée dans le corps. Tout accuse sa femme qui se trouvait dans la cabine avec lui. Mais alors qu'elle est internée, deux autres meurtres sont commis. Louise Massart, la fille de l'un des deux hommes tués, est désignée coupable de ces homicides et envoyée à la Salpêtrière.

programme.title: A l'intérieur
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 A Agnès

programme.title: A l'intérieur
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Ariane

programme.title: La mangeuse d'hommes
programme.desc: Jeanne, une gendarme incorruptible et ambitieuse va se retrouver entrainée dans une sombre magouille, entre son supérieur, l'adjudant-chef Paul Belmart et les frères Gutowski, des tocards de la mafia vosgienne, qui viennent de dérober 50 000 francs..

programme.title: Enfer blanc
programme.desc: Enok et Liv atterrissent à quelques kilomètres de la base militaire danoise, où se cachent les kidnappeurs. Une bataille sans merci s'engage bientôt. Au même moment, une découverte est sur le point de causer une querelle entre les ministres des Affaires étrangères danois et suédois..

programme.title: Enfer blanc
programme.desc: Les otages sont ramenés à Tasiilaq et Andrei Sokolov est emprisonné. A son retour, Enok constate la disparition de spn épouse et de sa fille. Les Etats-Unis proposent à la Suède de leur apporter leur protection en cas de conflit armé avec les Russes si Elsa suspend l'application du traité..

programme.title: Arctic Circle
programme.desc: En Laponie finlandaise, l'inspectrice Nina Kautsalo retrouve une prostituée russe en état d'hypothermie au fond d'une cave. Les analyses de sang de la victime indiquent qu'elle est porteuse d'un virus mortel.

programme.title: Arctic Circle
programme.desc: La motoneige de Raunola est repêchée dans une rivière gelée, mais le fuyard reste introuvable. Les premiers échanges entre Nina et Stenius, le chef de mission du Bureau d'enquêtes criminelles, sont plus que froids, celui-ci se montrant arrogant et méprisant. En outre, le KRP cache des informations à la police locale, exigeant de Nina qu'elle se contente de se mettre au service de Thomas. Le virologue, qui a signé une clause de confidentialité, décide néanmoins de coopérer avec Nina et ses collègues. C'est ainsi que les policiers découvrent que ce virus est une infection sexuellement transmissible. Marita, la soeur de Nina, est mise en quarantaine. Thomas repart à Helsinki pour analyser les échantillons prélevés sur les habitants d'Ivalo..

programme.title: The Shield

On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. programme.title: The Shield
The Shield
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Los Magnificos
programme.desc: The Shield: Created by Shawn Ryan. With Michael Chiklis, Michael Jace, Jay Karnes, CCH Pounder. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto"},"dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0286486/","name":"The Shield","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTcwNzQwODI5NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzQxMjI5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows the lives and cases of a dirty Los Angeles Police Department cop and the unit under his command.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0286486/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"danielcereto","dateCreated":"2020-07-31","inLanguage":"English","name":"The Shield on 2020","reviewBody":"I just finished this series today on July 2020 and all I have to say is that it does not look cheap, old or non interesting, just keeping in mind this was filmed between 2002-2008. First, most of the main cast are extremely good actors. Vic, Aceveda and Shane were the most powerful. Second, the storyline and the length of the chapters are quite good too. Probably the story could have been told with 4-5 seasons easily. But it is what it is. Last, camera work, make up and sound are pretty cool. I can't believe this show started on 2002. On the other hand, seems some characters were not fully developed or look like the writers didn't want to give them credit. But not a big thing. So, overall if you're looking for an excellent cops show, brutal, raw and almost perfect, this one is for you. Now, I'm going to watch The Wire. programme.title: Interruption des programmes
programme.desc: Ernest, un gros ours solitaire, bohème et bougon, a accueilli dans sa petite maison Célestine, une souricette orpheline, rebelle et intrépide. Ces deux personnages hors du commun, qui ont des caractères aussi différents que leur gabarit, apprennent à se connaître et à vivre ensemble. Ils côtoient Margotine, Mandarine et Mélusine, trois souris voisines, élèvent des abeilles et fabriquent leur propre confiture. Le plantigrade au grand cœur et le rongeur malicieux affrontent les problèmes de la vie quotidienne, comme la honte, la maladie ou les poux, partagent leurs joies et leurs peines, et s'interrogent sur leurs origines.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Une femme est retrouvée pendue à un arbre près d'une école primaire. Les policiers découvrent un dessin macabre représentant le jeu du pendu près du cadavre. Chargé de l'enquête, le lieutenant Will Ruiney fait appel à son ami Ray Archer, expert en criminologie à la retraite, pour l'aider à trouver l'assassin. Bientôt, une deuxième victime est retrouvée, assassinée de la même manière. Les deux acolytes comprennent qu'ils ont à faire à un tueur en série.

programme.title: Game of Thrones: The Last Watch
Game of Thrones – The Last Watch
programme.desc:
Game of Thrones: The Last Watch: Directed by Jeanie Finlay. With Kevin Alexander, Alfie Allen, Jacob Anderson, Gethin Anthony. Chronicling the creation of Game of Thrones (2011)'s final season, its most ambitious and complicated one." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt10090796/","name":"Game of Thrones: The Last Watch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDdlMzQzNDQtNTAxMS00NTMyLTgxYTAtYzQ0OGI1YzZhY2Y3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Chronicling the creation of Game of Thrones (2011)'s final season, its most ambitious and complicated one.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt10090796/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"manuel_medeiros"},"dateCreated":"2019-05-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Does not live up to the potential given it is making off of one of the best shows of all time","reviewBody":"Given were talking about one of the best shows ever in the history of television I think behind the scenes documentary for the last season would have enormous potential And I can say that in my view The Last Watch fails to live up to their potential

Why? Firstly because you would want to hear from the main actors and from the writers - controversy aside - the producers, etc. Instead, most of the time is focused on a prosthetic artist (sure, she has a struggle by being away from their family but waay too much time is spent on this) and believe it or not on the Head of Snow, yes the person responsiblee for coordinating the amount of snow in each of the scenes

Obviously these people are important for the show and convey the amount of man hours and work that going it to making, but it is not the ones I would like to hear from when such an epic journey reaches its final Destination

HBO had a small chance of giving a treat to some of the fans that were disappointed by season 8 and in my view failed to seize the opportunity

6 out of 10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6052,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Documentary"],"datePublished":"2019-05-26","keywords":"retrospective,reminiscence,behind the scenes,making of,clip show","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2313796633","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE2MmY5ZjItNjViMy00YTA2LThmZjUtYTQwNGUxNTFkN2I5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDE2MmY5ZjItNjViMy00YTA2LThmZjUtYTQwNGUxNTFkN2I5XkEyXkFqcGdeQWtlbGFyc2Vu._V1_.jpg","description":"A farewell to Westeros with the people who built the realm. programme.title: Thronecast
programme.desc: In der von Sue Perkins und Jamie East präsentieren britischen Talkshow dreht sich alles um die Kultserie "Game of Thrones". Die Sendungen sind jeweils eine Stunde lang und enthalten Interviews mit Mitgliedern der Besetzung und der Crew. Zudem werden die bislang gelaufenen Episoden der Serie analysiert und es wird darüber spekuliert, was sich in der nächsten Folge ereignen könnte.

During the Great Depression, an Oklahoma farm boy and a charismatic minister learn that they are key players in a proxy war being fought between Heaven and Hell." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0319969/","name":"Carnivàle","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDU5YTdlNzItZjhhMy00YmRkLWI2MzAtNTU5ZDFiNjFiYmVmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTA4NzY1MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"During the Great Depression, an Oklahoma farm boy and a charismatic minister learn that they are key players in a proxy war being fought between Heaven and Hell.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0319969/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"snowboarder1957"},"dateCreated":"2006-05-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Story and Character driven Masterpiece!","reviewBody":"Carnivale will take you on a journey beyond the normal human boundaries into a world where weirdness and metaphysical wonders will capture your imagination. Once hooked in from the beginning, it is a feast in every sense of the word as you will keep wondering how it will unfold, what course of events will follow. Definitely a story for thirsty adults who are bored with plot driven formulas, and long to enter a world of magic. The acting, visuals, and story delivers! 

The story focuses on Ben Hawkins, a young man who knows he has the power to heal set in the Dust Bowl of the 1930's. Ben is "lost" and picked up by a traveling Carnivale where seen by the unseen management who spots what Ben really is. Ben's healing power can bring you back from the dead, not just heal you from being crippled as seen in the very first episode, which completely hooked me and I only saw the last few minutes of the show. 

Ben must come to understand how to use his gift and exactly what seems to happen when the "avatar energy" comes through him. There is conflict inside Ben that creates the back drop for the rest of the story as he figures out who he is. The images inside Ben's mind are both artful and intriguing which keep you wanting to know more. In Carnivale the characters grow and develop, each weaving a wondrous part in the tapestry of good and evil. 

Some say Carnivale starts out slow, however the level of acting, and story telling delivers past the point fascination, and nothing else out there even comes close!!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":43817,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.4},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2003-09-14","keywords":"surrealism,surreal,carnie,male full rear nudity,large breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0027199/","name":"Michael J. IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yossarian100","dateCreated":"2008-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love at First Bite","reviewBody":"Another interesting, entertaining, and slightly on the odd side series from HBO that should have more than enough sex and blood for those more discerning fans of our mythical long toothed friends, the vampires.

On the other hand, some may find it little more than an "R" rated soap opera with teeth.

I'm more forgiving. I liked the first episode, thought it had a fairly strong cast, and the story held my interest, even though some of the southern accents sounded a bit strange. Still, having a lead character who is wound a little too tight, there's a reason for that, is a fresh enough idea and Anna Paquin, as Sookie Stackhouse...you heard that right, is well cast.

I'm looking forward to the next episode. Maybe this new show will reach right out and bite you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":237614,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0844441, Title: True Blood, --- Description: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yossarian100","dateCreated":"2008-06-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Love at First Bite","reviewBody":"Another interesting, entertaining, and slightly on the odd side series from HBO that should have more than enough sex and blood for those more discerning fans of our mythical long toothed friends, the vampires.

On the other hand, some may find it little more than an "R" rated soap opera with teeth.

I'm more forgiving. I liked the first episode, thought it had a fairly strong cast, and the story held my interest, even though some of the southern accents sounded a bit strange. Still, having a lead character who is wound a little too tight, there's a reason for that, is a fresh enough idea and Anna Paquin, as Sookie Stackhouse...you heard that right, is well cast.

I'm looking forward to the next episode. Maybe this new show will reach right out and bite you.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":237614,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 3501074, Title: Madam Secretary, --- Description: Madam Secretary: Created by Barbara Hall. With Téa Leoni, Tim Daly, Erich Bergen, Zeljko Ivanek. A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt3501074/","name":"Madam Secretary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWJiMTNiNDktZGM1ZS00NmU3LWFiNmQtNjc0ZjNlMTU5ZjAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjg4NzAyOTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A political drama which looks into the life of the Secretary of State as she tries to balance work with family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3501074/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pplluk","dateCreated":"2014-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good start","reviewBody":"For me as an European I watched this show, as many other on the same subject, as an entertainment and not as an intellectual and purist page of pure politic..... Comparing Tea Leoni's character with Hillary Clinton is just BS, in my humble opinion as a foreigner, Tea is in every way a lot better, no comparison, if only the US will have a woman like this show is portraying, I'll bet she would be the next President... unfortunately it doesn't. I can understand if you are a politician or in any way work in the system, well, probably you'd be disappointed with the terminology and accuracy of the script. I would say this is a show not for you or for any social aggressive, intolerant or cynic, anti-religious, racist or plain and simple ignorant. I enjoyed the scenery, music, costumes, and above all a fresh cast: powerful and with very good acting. The script is articulate, intelligent with good references and subtext. There are some clichés why not? They give it a more real approach; we do have them all around us. That it has some religious context, why not? Is not your religion? Or you're an atheist, or you consider yourself above all religion believes?! Good for you! And so on and so forth. If you don't agree or like something, just ignore it or be active and ask yourself why is it there? Perhaps there is a reason, even if the reason is no reason at all and it was just a nonsensical thing... :- ) Sit back and enjoy the show, if you don't like it, you know what to do, just switch to another one, or read a good book or spend some time doing what you love. Don't punish yourself watching something you don't like just to go ahead and spread your anger for everyone to see as if the rest of the world would have to listen and follow!!!. I hope I'll be entertained with this show if not I'll change and search for another one. Making comparisons is not bad but trying to compare everything!!! I just think you lose perspective... and is bad for your health.... Be positive and constructive, there is enough violence and intolerance in the world, let's try and be proactive and contribute for a better and fairer society... it begins in each and every one no matter your colour, religious believes or social status... BE HAPPY!! Contributing in a positive way...","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":21755,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6,"contentRating":"TV-PG","genre":["Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2014-09-21","keywords":"politician,political drama,timeframe 2010s,timeframe 21st century,secretary of state","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000495/","name":"Téa Leoni","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004857/","name":"Tim Daly","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2706992/","name":"Erich Bergen"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0111281/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0075256/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0274041/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355329/","name":"Barbara Hall"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Madam Secretary: Series Premiere","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4153522201","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmY2OWVmZDctNzBiYy00YjEyLWIxZjItZGNkM2I4YTlhODYyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"First Look Trailer"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Treme: Created by Eric Ellis Overmyer, David Simon. With Khandi Alexander, Rob Brown, Kim Dickens, Melissa Leo. Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sargebri"},"dateCreated":"2010-05-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Slice of Life Drama","reviewBody":"This is definitely one of the best shows on HBO. It shows how New Orleans is coping with the disaster of Katrina with not only great scripts but with great characters such as Davis (Steve Zahn), Ladonna (Khandi Alexander), Antoine (Wendell Pierce) and "Big Chief" Albert (Clarke Peters). In fact, the character of Davis is truly a one of a kind character. He is both passionate and manic and you can truly feel his passion as well as his anger over the disaster that destroyed his adopted hometown. Also, this definitely captures the spirit of New Orleans, both good and bad and the true star of the show is the city of New Orleans itself with This definitely has a chance of becoming a true classic and hopefully the audience will continue to grow for this wonderful show."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":14287,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Music"],"datePublished":"2010-04-11","keywords":"21st century,post hurricane katrina,reference to hurricane katrina,timeframe 21st century,radio station","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018554/","name":"Khandi Alexander"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0114532/","name":"Rob Brown"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0225332/","name":"Kim Dickens"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019588/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0284741/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0653899/","name":"Eric Ellis Overmyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0800108/","name":"David Simon"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season Four Preview","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226458905","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDAyMDM5NTg2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzI0NDYyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the season four trailer for "Treme"!"}}</script><metacontent="

Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt1279972/","name":"Treme","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjg4ZGZkYjEtYTZhMy00YjU1LTg1MTYtNDlmNTAwYTA0M2NmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Life after Hurricane Katrina as the residents of New Orleans try to rebuild their lives, their homes, and their unique culture in the aftermath of one of the worst natural disasters in the USA.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1279972/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Sargebri","dateCreated":"2010-05-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Great Slice of Life Drama","reviewBody":"This is definitely one of the best shows on HBO. It shows how New Orleans is coping with the disaster of Katrina with not only great scripts but with great characters such as Davis (Steve Zahn), Ladonna (Khandi Alexander), Antoine (Wendell Pierce) and "Big Chief" Albert (Clarke Peters). In fact, the character of Davis is truly a one of a kind character. He is both passionate and manic and you can truly feel his passion as well as his anger over the disaster that destroyed his adopted hometown. programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 2699128, Title: The Leftovers, --- Description: The Leftovers: Created by Damon Lindelof, Tom Perrotta. With Justin Theroux, Amy Brenneman, Christopher Eccleston, Chris Zylka. Three years after the disappearance of 2% of the global human population, a group of people in a small New York community try to continue their lives while coping with the tragedy of the unexplained nature of the event." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt2699128/","name":"The Leftovers","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTE3MDc1MjY4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDg4MjQ4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three years after the disappearance of 2% of the global human population, a group of people in a small New York community try to continue their lives while coping with the tragedy of the unexplained nature of the event.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2699128/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"yollarbenibekler","dateCreated":"2020-05-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not for everyobody.","reviewBody":"Well... Where do I start? I'm Cem, I live in a small town Babaeski, 200 miles west to Istanbul, Turkey. Forgive me for my english language, I'm still improving. I don't like writing reviews but I had to do it and it had to be this.

On a hot and sunny summer day, I started watching... this. Experience. Just like watching any other TV show, I grabbed my beer and chips, I leaned back and pressed the start button.

Then I couldn't stop. That beer was never finished. Chips gone stale. My mind just gone nuts, trying to comprehend the new reality, the new angle of vision of how I perceive life and death. The existence. Some episodes hit me so hard that I had to lock my room in case anyone enter and see me in tears. Never in my life have I cried with my chin trembling; even in most of the funerals I attended I ever gave a flinch.

I have made mistakes by recommending this masterpiece to everyone I know. Some of them hardly watched the first episode and got bored immediately.

Then I understood.

I understood that only those who can question their existence, their purpose; only those who seek a path to walk can apprehend what is going on in the story. So this show became my -sort of- bible, a sacred altar that hidden deep in my basement. I could only show this altar to those who are worthy. And not many people around me are worthy enough, I realized.

Surrounded by vast fields and lands, populated with a small-talk, small-do people, I felt alone. Got depressed about it. Got drunk, cried, started taking anti-depressants, recovered, found a dull job, watched TV again, went out with friends, got drunk, forgot all about it, forgot all about the show; at least I thought so.

Sometimes, when I'm happy, when everyone's happy and laughing and joking, I remember Nora. I remember Kevin. I remember Matt. My never-seen-in-my-life friends. Then that famous piano solo plays in my mind; like an echo coming from deep. I have an urge to reach them and hug them and tell them it's ok, you got this, everything will be all right. We are just specks of dust in this vast universe and we'll die as soon as we're born. We will not have all the answers we seek in this life. In this vast and scary universe, we only got each other. We only got who are still here. We only got who are left.

I have a beautiful girlfriend now; best imaginable. I'll marry her. She will always be with me till death. But that emptiness will always walk with me. I will not even mention this gap in my heart. This thought. This black stain that haunts me and keeps me up at night. We are in a scary universe and we are alone. Nobody will hold my hand when I die. Nobody will keep holding my hand when I walk the inevitable, cold, misty road. I'll be scared. God, what will I do when that time comes? A speck of dust like me, what importance I have anyway. I live and I die. I'll become a tombstone in this world, catching somebody's eyes in a year or so, for a moment, and forgotten eternally.

This is heavy. I don't know if this knowledge; this realisation, this "upper consciousness" is a blessing or a curse. Now that I'm "aware", I value every second of my life. Never I got bored since I realized how little time we got left. No matter how dull is my job, I have cared for everyone and everything that needed my attention and my help. I gave more than I take for myself granted. I 'll continue to help and bring joy to everyone I can reach.

But that black stain, that scary monster waiting in the shadows, the void stare in the mirror, the echoing solo coming from underground, two begging eyes, the hopeless me will be kept as a secret till I die.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90319,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2014-06-29","keywords":"dog,tragedy drama,psychological drama,supernatural drama,supernatural fantasy","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0857620/","name":"Justin Theroux","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000312/","name":"Amy Brenneman","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001172/","name":"Christopher Eccleston"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152188/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005035/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0674909/","name":"Tom Perrotta"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Final Season Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi962180633","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjlhZjNmYjUtYWViZS00NWUwLWFhZWMtODUyMjcyNTRjMzcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjlhZjNmYjUtYWViZS00NWUwLWFhZWMtODUyMjcyNTRjMzcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the Final Season Trailer for "The Leftovers.""</script><metacontent="

Where do I start? I'm Cem, I live in a small town Babaeski, 200 miles west to Istanbul, Turkey. Forgive me for my english language, I'm still improving. I don't like writing reviews but I had to do it and it had to be this.

On a hot and sunny summer day, I started watching... this. Experience. Just like watching any other TV show, I grabbed my beer and chips, I leaned back and pressed the start button.

Then I couldn't stop. That beer was never finished. Chips gone stale. My mind just gone nuts, trying to comprehend the new reality, the new angle of vision of how I perceive life and death. The existence. Some episodes hit me so hard that I had to lock my room in case anyone enter and see me in tears. Never in my life have I cried with my chin trembling; even in most of the funerals I attended I ever gave a flinch.

I have made mistakes by recommending this masterpiece to everyone I know. Some of them hardly watched the first episode and got bored immediately.

Then I understood.

I understood that only those who can question their existence, their purpose; only those who seek a path to walk can apprehend what is going on in the story. So this show became my -sort of- bible, a sacred altar that hidden deep in my basement. I could only show this altar to those who are worthy. And not many people around me are worthy enough, I realized.

Surrounded by vast fields and lands, populated with a small-talk, small-do people, I felt alone. Got depressed about it. Got drunk, cried, started taking anti-depressants, recovered, found a dull job, watched TV again, went out with friends, got drunk, forgot all about it, forgot all about the show; at least I thought so.

Sometimes, when I'm happy, when everyone's happy and laughing and joking, I remember Nora. I remember Kevin. I remember Matt. My never-seen-in-my-life friends. Then that famous piano solo plays in my mind; like an echo coming from deep. I have an urge to reach them and hug them and tell them it's ok, you got this, everything will be all right. We are just specks of dust in this vast universe and we'll die as soon as we're born. We will not have all the answers we seek in this life. In this vast and scary universe, we only got each other. We only got who are still here. We only got who are left.

I have a beautiful girlfriend now; best imaginable. I'll marry her. She will always be with me till death. But that emptiness will always walk with me. I will not even mention this gap in my heart. This thought. This black stain that haunts me and keeps me up at night. We are in a scary universe and we are alone. Nobody will hold my hand when I die. Nobody will keep holding my hand when I walk the inevitable, cold, misty road. I'll be scared. God, what will I do when that time comes? A speck of dust like me, what importance I have anyway. I live and I die. I'll become a tombstone in this world, catching somebody's eyes in a year or so, for a moment, and forgotten eternally.

This is heavy. I don't know if this knowledge; this realisation, this "upper consciousness" is a blessing or a curse. Now that I'm "aware", I value every second of my life. Never I got bored since I realized how little time we got left. No matter how dull is my job, I have cared for everyone and everything that needed my attention and my help. programme.title: The Bourne Identity
Die Bourne-Identität
programme.desc:
The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. This film should be on everyone's top ten list.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":529574,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"amnesia,secret past,money,assassin,dark past","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bourne Identity","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi680919321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177933/","name":"Chris Cooper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035615/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0380819/","name":"W. The Bourne Supremacy: Directed by Paul Greengrass. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Brian Cox, Julia Stiles. When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0372183/","name":"The Bourne Supremacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIyMDFmMmItMWQzYy00MjBiLTg2M2UtM2JiNDRhOWE4NjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0372183/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pied"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superior Action Film...","reviewBody":"This is a superior action film with the added bonus of good acting by Joan Allen, Matt Damon, and Karl Urban among others. The camera work is amazing.

I especially liked the on-locale settings of Russia and Germany.

Jason Bourne is a walking CIA specimen whom the agency deems to dangerous to live. Not all the facts are known about some mysterious murders in Berlin but Jason Bourne is suspected. You know his idyllic life on a remote island will be blown from the first.

How this all is resolved takes the viewer on a non-stop chase through various foreign countries. 

Good flick!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":450534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-08-25","keywords":"hidden truth,suspense,secret past,dark past,amnesia","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000260/","name":"Joan Allen"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339030/","name":"Paul Greengrass"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143778/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0372183, Title: The Bourne Supremacy, --- Description: The Bourne Supremacy: Directed by Paul Greengrass. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Brian Cox, Julia Stiles. When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0372183/","name":"The Bourne Supremacy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTIyMDFmMmItMWQzYy00MjBiLTg2M2UtM2JiNDRhOWE4NjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjU0OTQ0OTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0372183/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"pied","dateCreated":"2004-09-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Superior Action Film...","reviewBody":"This is a superior action film with the added bonus of good acting by Joan Allen, Matt Damon, and Karl Urban among others. The camera work is amazing.

I especially liked the on-locale settings of Russia and Germany.

Jason Bourne is a walking CIA specimen whom the agency deems to dangerous to live. Not all the facts are known about some mysterious murders in Berlin but Jason Bourne is suspected. You know his idyllic life on a remote island will be blown from the first.

How this all is resolved takes the viewer on a non-stop chase through various foreign countries. 

Good flick!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":450534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2004-08-25","keywords":"hidden truth,suspense,secret past,dark past,amnesia","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000260/","name":"Joan Allen"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0339030/","name":"Paul Greengrass"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0143778/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"],"duration":"PT1H48M"</script><metacontent="

A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117468/","name":"Retroactive","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxODIwNDA3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDEyNzUyMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A psychiatrist makes multiple trips through time to save a woman that was murdered by her brutal husband.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117468/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"bobcathy78"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"a better than average film","reviewBody":"I had picked up the DVD at a store not knowing much about the film, and was surprised that the film was as good as it was. I like Belushi. I think he played this part very well. I had never heard of Kylie Travis before, but I thought she was very good in this film. I thought she played the tough woman part well. I like the movies where there's a tough heroine. Like the Alien movies.

Of course, it didn't hurt that Kylie's good looking too. The plot was interesting. I won't divulge the rest of the movie, but suffice it to say, if someone likes adventure and science fiction together, this movie might fill the bill. If you find it at your local video store, I would suggest buying it and adding it to your collection.

My summary is that it's a better than average film. programme.title: The Last Legion
Die letzte Legion
programme.desc: The Last Legion: Directed by Doug Lefler. With Colin Firth, Ben Kingsley, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Peter Mullan. As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0462396/","name":"The Last Legion","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmJhOTMyMTMtMDc0Yi00YTg2LWE0MWUtYWY0OTBmZTMzMmU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODE5NzE3OTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"As the Roman empire crumbles, young Romulus Augustus flees the city and embarks on a perilous voyage to Britain to track down a legion of supporters.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0462396/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ma-cortes"},"dateCreated":"2009-07-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Features exciting fighting scenes, impressive battles and fabulous costumes","reviewBody":"This is a nice production with an average budget, great sets and thundering battles about the fall of the Roman Empire. Although the complete Roman Empire decline and fall took centuries, by the end of fifth century it was simply a battleground for warring rival Caesars and Barbarians chiefs. The Germans gather, take over and pull down the Roman gates. The Goths commanded by Odoacer(Peter Mullan), king of Herulos, invade Rome(476 AD), assesinated Orestes(Iain Glen), father of emperor Romulus Augustulos (Thomas Sangster). The young Caesar is sent to Capri along with his preceptor Ambrosinus(Ben Kingsley). A motley group of soldiers led by loyal Aurelianus (Colin Firth) are assigned by senator Nestor (John Hannah) to free him. They're accompanied by a beautiful Indian warrior named Mira (Aishwarya Rai). Without another alternative, they travel to Britannia to meet the last legion, located near the Wall of Adriano; but they're pursued by relentless barbarians (Kevin McKidd, James Cosmo). Although the Romans had partially withdrawn from Britain and its politics essentially dissolved into chaos. Later on, it's thought that a minor war lord, probably named Artos, did his best to maintain civilization and Christianity in the west of England.\n\nThis is a larger-than-life production with good direction, interesting scripting, and enthusiastic performances place this far above the usual empty-headed historical spectacle. Several action scenes are outstanding with spectacular battle images and thrilling fights. Unfortunately, on small house screens much of the splendor will be lost. You will be left with the wooden Colin Firth and the gorgeous Aishwarya Rai in a love story that was underdeveloped due tho the film's emphasis on spectacle. The picture packs colorful cinematography by Pontecorvo and evocative musical score by Patrick Doyle. The flick is professionally directed by Doug Lefler, who previously made ¨Dragonheart , a new beginning ¨. Rating : Good, it's a nice extravaganza well set in ancient Rome, done in great scale and praised for its action sequences.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":35223,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","War"],"datePublished":"2007-11-07","keywords":"roman legion,woman warrior,5th century,goths,catapult","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Last Legion","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2599747865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODk0ODI5Y2QtMzU3Zi00ODJiLWJiNzYtMTFkZTQ5Mjg5NzM2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from The Weinstein Company"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001426/","name":"Ben Kingsley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706787/","name":"Aishwarya Rai Bachchan"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498991/","name":"Doug Lefler"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014380/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0120901/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0136728/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125336/","name":"Jez Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0125358/","name":"Tom Butterworth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0137363/","name":"Carlo Carlei"}],"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Bourne Identity
Die Bourne-Identität
programme.desc:
The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. This film should be on everyone's top ten list.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":529574,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.9},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2002-09-25","keywords":"amnesia,secret past,money,assassin,dark past","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Bourne Identity","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi680919321","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGZkYTZjNTctNjkzOS00YjAzLTk5MTgtMGQwYWJiODI5MDNkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Universal Studios Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004376/","name":"Franka Potente"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000354/","name":"Matt Damon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177933/","name":"Chris Cooper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0013175/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035615/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0006904/","name":"Tony Gilroy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0380819/","name":"W. Blake Herron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0524924/","name":"Robert Ludlum"}],"duration":"PT1H59M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 0258463, Title: The Bourne Identity, --- Description: The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4","dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. programme.title: Rogue Assassin
War
programme.desc: Rogue Assassin: Directed by Philip G. Atwell. With Jet Li, Jason Statham, John Lone, Devon Aoki. An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0499556/","name":"War","alternateName":"Rogue Assassin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTIwMjE2Mjc1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNzI0OTI3._V1_.jpg","description":"An FBI Agent seeks vengeance on a mysterious assassin known as "Rogue" who murdered his partner.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0499556/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MR_Heraclius"},"dateCreated":"2020-02-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"It's good movie to watch","reviewBody":"It's Jet Li vs. Jason Statham in War, an exciting martial arts action film. An FBI agent out for revenge pursues a notorious assassin named Rogue who's come to San Francisco to instigate a war between the Triads and the Yakuza. The storytelling is rather good, especially in creating suspense and intrigue. And, the fight sequences are particularly impressive. However, the characters aren't given much depth and seem more like stereotypes. programme.title: Death Wish 3
Death Wish III
programme.desc:
Death Wish 3: Directed by Michael Winner. With Charles Bronson, Deborah Raffin, Ed Lauter, Martin Balsam. Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey arrives back in New York City and is forcibly recruited by a crooked police chief to fight street crime caused by a large gang terrorizing the neighborhoods." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0089003/","name":"Death Wish 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGE5MmNlMDktMmVmNC00M2VlLWJkNjItYzJjMzM4MDY5ODY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjc1NTYyMjg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Architect/vigilante Paul Kersey arrives back in New York City and is forcibly recruited by a crooked police chief to fight street crime caused by a large gang terrorizing the neighborhoods.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0089003/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Mr Parker"},"dateCreated":"2005-12-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"Order your rocket launcher today!","reviewBody":"I'm having a lot of trouble trying to figure out how to rate this movie. As an actual film, it can't honestly score more than one star out of five. As pure cheese however, you'd have to give this movie a straight up five out of five.

This is probably one of the worst movies I have ever seen. The catch is, it's so bad that it's actually good. Make sense? The movie is infinitely rewatchable and you can always find something new to laugh at every time you pop this sucker in the player. There is very little to tell you about this movie other than if you haven't seen it, you need to. It's unbelievably violent and Ol' Chuck mows down at least a hundred gang members throughout the film's ninety minutes.

I can write an entire dissertation on this film but I've already seen it done on the Web on quite a few sites so I'm not going to bother. Just to remind you, the movie is so bad and unintentionally funny (watching the film again, it'd make sense if the filmmakers were going for laughs) that if you haven't seen it, you need to.

I'll leave you to ponder this one scene and decide for yourselves whether or not this movie is for you or not: Gang bikers come down the street. Angry civilians wait with a chain stretched across the road. Bikers come and are clotheslined off of their bikes when the chain is yanked upwards. While the bikers are on the floor, the civilians come out and shoot all of them, point blank while they lay writhing on the floor. Men, women and oh yes, children come out and join in the festivities, dancing around the dead bodies of the bikers.

Sigh. Instant classic.

RATING: * out of *****. 

SHLOCK-O-CHEESE RATING: ***** out of *****.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":15207,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1985-11-01","keywords":"vigilante,woman in jeopardy,violence against women,rape victim,violence","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Death Wish 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2012721689","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3ODM1OWYtMGY2Ni00MTkwLTg2MjEtN2Y4NjY1MmZlNjRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3ODM1OWYtMGY2Ni00MTkwLTg2MjEtN2Y4NjY1MmZlNjRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer for Death Wish 3"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000314/","name":"Charles Bronson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0706298/","name":"Deborah Raffin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0491590/","name":"Ed Lauter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935382/","name":"Michael Winner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0206391/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0415979/","name":"Don Jakoby"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0307257/","name":"Brian Garfield"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Silent Rage
Das stumme Ungeheuer
programme.desc: Silent Rage: Directed by Michael Miller. With Chuck Norris, Ron Silver, Steven Keats, Toni Kalem. A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0084684/","name":"Silent Rage","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzk5NWYwNGUtYWJmZC00NDc2LTk0YzQtZWFmN2Q5MDQ2ZGFjL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzc5MjA3OA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0084684/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Scars_Remain"},"dateCreated":"2008-04-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun but Sometimes Dull","reviewBody":"If you can get past the painfully slow and boring parts of this film, you should have a rather good time watching it much like I did. It's a fun little horror from the 80's with the ridiculous but hilarious Chuck Norris so of course, you can expect cheesy lines and poorly placed kung fu moves from him.\n\nI was actually surprised by some of the suspense in this film. They actually managed quite a bit of it. The story is pretty silly but it seems like every Chuck Norris movie has the same premise in a way: some sort of bad guy is terrorizing people and Chuck Norris has to fight him. The acting was pretty bad but I guess that's expected. Don't expect an Oscar worthy film from this but turn off your brain for 100 minutes and have a good time!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5613,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Horror"],"datePublished":"1982-04-02","keywords":"slasher,two word title,face slap,fat man,sex scene","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi77251353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE4Nzc5OWQtYzdlYy00Njg4LWFlODctOTk3MDBkYzdiOTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTE4Nzc5OWQtYzdlYy00Njg4LWFlODctOTk3MDBkYzdiOTc3XkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"A sheriff tries to stop the killing spree of a silent maniacal murderer who, as the result of secret genetic experimentation by an unethical scientist, has the ability to self-heal."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001569/","name":"Chuck Norris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0798779/","name":"Ron Silver"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0444198/","name":"Steven Keats"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0588964/","name":"Michael Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0070015/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289707/","name":"Joseph Fraley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0223988/","name":"Edward Di Lorenzo"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nur Gott kann mich richten
Nur Gott kann mich richten
programme.desc: Nur Gott kann mich richten: Directed by Özgür Yildirim. With Neil Malik Abdullah, Kai Ivo Baulitz, Moritz Bleibtreu, Zejhun Demirov. After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, and Ricky could use the money to set up his new life. Ricky hesitates at first but then agrees. Complications arise as soon as some preparations start. Things kept going out in awry, especially as a form of hardup policewoman Diana." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6175764/","name":"Nur Gott kann mich richten","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjExZjMyMTItNWVjYy00M2U4LTllZTAtYzQwNDdkZmVkNDBiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMzA3Njg4MzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a botched robbery attempt five years ago, Ricky went to jail for his brother Rafael and his buddy Latif. Now that he is back out of jail, Latif wants to show his gratitude: he says he has a surefire scheme to get rich quickly, ","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6175764/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"kosmasp"},"dateCreated":"2021-03-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"And the reviewers can too","reviewBody":"So it will be up to us to give this the thumbs up or down treatment. As you can see clearly I'm giving this two thumbs up. And while I'm not comparing it directly too, I personally felt this could be a companion piece to a 90s movie called "Kurz und Schmerzlos" by Fatih Akin.\n\nThere are certain elements that you can compare I reckon - like three male main characters. The fact that there is criminal lifestyles involved ... but there are also quite a few things that are different. Way different. Still I really like both movies and this has the great Moritz Bleibtreu in it. He can walk that thin line between raging mad, but also likeable and reletable ... you do root for him - maybe not all the time, but you can dig what he tries to do and where his intentions lie. You can also understand everyone elses motivation ... even when they clash with each other ... very well done! A genre piece with great acting and a really strong, grim, dark and gritty story ...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1973,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"datePublished":"2018-01-25","keywords":"frankfurt germany,botched robbery,jail,revenge,strong female character","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3918510873","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2NzdlYjgtNzQ5OC00NzAzLWEwZTMtYTk1MWViMWJmOTI1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2494529/","name":"Neil Malik Abdullah"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0062049/","name":"Kai Ivo Baulitz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001953/","name":"Moritz Bleibtreu"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002257/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0612398/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0065798/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1641324/","name":"Özgür Yildirim"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="
